verses.text: Rescue me, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, from evil men. Protect me from men \w of|strong="H4210"\w* violence,
\w who|strong="H3068"\w* devise \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* hearts \w and|strong="H3068"\w* stir up war \w all|strong="H3068"\w* day long.

\w They|strong="H3117"\w* sharpen \w their|strong="H3605"\w* tongues \w like|strong="H2803"\w* snakes; \w the|strong="H3605"\w* venom \w of|strong="H3117"\w* vipers \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* lips.\f + \fr 140:3 \ft Cited in Romans 3:13\f* Selah

Guard \w me|strong="H8478"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w from|strong="H8478"\w* \w the|strong="H8478"\w* hands \w of|strong="H8478"\w* \w the|strong="H8478"\w* \w wicked|strong="H8478"\w*. Keep \w me|strong="H8478"\w* safe \w from|strong="H8478"\w* men \w of|strong="H8478"\w* violence who scheme \w to|strong="H2534"\w* make \w me|strong="H8478"\w* stumble.

\w The|strong="H8104"\w* proud hide \w a|strong="H3068"\w* snare \w for|strong="H3027"\w* \w me|strong="H8104"\w*; \w the|strong="H8104"\w* cords \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* net \w are|strong="H7563"\w* spread \w along|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* path, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* lures \w are|strong="H7563"\w* set \w out|strong="H7563"\w* \w for|strong="H3027"\w* \w me|strong="H8104"\w*. Selah

\w I|strong="H3027"\w* say \w to|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, “\w You|strong="H3027"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* \w my|strong="H6566"\w* \w God|strong="H3027"\w*.” Hear, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w my|strong="H6566"\w* cry \w for|strong="H3027"\w* help.

\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w GOD|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* strength \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* salvation, \w You|strong="H6963"\w* shield \w my|strong="H3068"\w* head \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* day \w of|strong="H3068"\w* battle.

Grant not, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H3069"\w* desires \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3069"\w* wicked; do not promote \w their|strong="H3117"\w* evil plans, lest \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w be|strong="H3117"\w* exalted. Selah

\w May|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* heads \w of|strong="H3068"\w* those \w who|strong="H3068"\w* surround \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* covered \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* trouble \w their|strong="H3068"\w* lips \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w caused|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w May|strong="H8193"\w* burning coals fall \w on|strong="H7218"\w* them; \w may|strong="H8193"\w* they \w be|strong="H8193"\w* thrown into \w the|strong="H3680"\w* fire, into \w the|strong="H3680"\w* miry pits, never \w to|strong="H7218"\w* rise again.

\w May|strong="H5307"\w* \w no|strong="H1077"\w* slanderer \w be|strong="H1077"\w* \w established|strong="H6965"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* land; \w may|strong="H5307"\w* calamity hunt \w down|strong="H5307"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w man|strong="H5307"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* violence.

\w I|strong="H3559"\w* know \w that|strong="H7451"\w* \w the|strong="H3559"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* upholds justice \w for|strong="H3559"\w* \w the|strong="H3559"\w* poor \w and|strong="H2555"\w* defends \w the|strong="H3559"\w* cause \w of|strong="H3956"\w* \w the|strong="H3559"\w* needy.

\w Surely|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* righteous \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w praise|strong="H3588"\w* \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* name; \w the|strong="H3588"\w* upright \w will|strong="H3068"\w* dwell \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* presence.
